name: Just a turtle game
description:
This is my first public game made for the #seajam game jam in 14 days.

Please note:

- my WebGL build didn't work, so there's only a download file

- this version is not done, it is just the core mechanic of it finished

- I would like to work more on the visuals (animations, fancier fonts, interesting background etc.), sounds and adding more levels

- I would like to make a phone version, too

You can encourage me to continue with developing the game by donating a few dollars to me. I will send 50% of what I get #teamseas or other eco-projects.

Thanks :)
